description:
The Camera Hardware Engineering group is responsible for all research, design, development, test, and qualification of camera hardware for Apple products. This team is seeking an exceptional Camera Image Quality Engineer with responsibilities for ongoing evaluation, benchmarking and characterization of Apple camera products.

•Work closely with cross functional teams and support the entire development cycle of Apple cameras, from early prototype to product launch.
•Lead image quality validation at component and system levels.
•Comprehensively characterize and quantitatively assess camera performance and image quality.
•Provide feedback and contribute to refinement and improvement of camera design and process.
•Develop image processing algorithm for image quality metrics.
•Incubate new metrology for next-generation Apple products and support technology transfer from lab to production sites.
•Deliver executive level presentations of results.
preferred_qualifications: MS and beyond in EE, Optics, Color Science or equivalent. Excellent problem solving and analytical skills. Strong programming skills on digital image processing, data analysis & visualization. Familiarity with mobile camera components and functions and basic understanding of camera ISP pipeline and 3A. Hand-on experience on prototyping algorithm for quantitative characterization of image quality. Experience with automation of data acquisition. Knowledge of megapixel CMOS image sensor technology, lens selection and qualification. Experience with objective camera bench testing and subjective image quality analysis.
